name: play-component-commonjs
description: Playing with CommonJS UI components with optional jQuery plugin API
author: Tim Welch

scripts.build: npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod && npm run build-prod-jq
scripts.build-dev: NODE_ENV=development browserify js/index.js --debug --standalone dots > dist/dots-dev.js && parcelify js/index.js -c dist/dots.css
scripts.build-prod: NODE_ENV=production browserify js/index.js --external jquery --debug --plugin [minifyify --map dots.js.map --output dist/dots.js.map] --standalone dots > dist/dots.js
scripts.build-prod-jq: NODE_ENV=production browserify js/index.js --debug --plugin [minifyify --map dots-jq.js.map --output dist/dots-jq.js.map] --standalone dots > dist/dots-jq.js
